file_content.text: [This comm station has been deactivated.]
The droids will get you inside the lab, but the Empire's gotten their hands on Danison Varik, one of the best scientists on Corellia.
The prototype droids are Varik's work, as are the lab's security systems--the deadliest in the galaxy.
Is Varik an Imperial hostage or an ally?
Whose side is Varik on?
I couldn't contact anyone inside the lab. If he is a traitor, you'll find out fast.
Is there any way around Varik's security?
Do you have any advice?
The disaster relief droids are built to outlast security systems. Using them might save your life.
Droids don't scare me.
Be careful. Varik's droids take out Republic reinforcements every day. Imagine what his security could do to you.
Once you're inside the lab, find the testing grounds. Varik, his team and the Empire's droids should all be there.
Destroy the droids, and the Republic's supply runs will make it through Labor Valley. Councillor Belos guarantees it.
Those droids won't be leaving the Empire's lab again.
I'll take care of them.
Appreciate the help.
Councillor Belos helped you. I'm just his assistant.
You better hope so.
The only way this plan fails is if you die. Wasted time won't matter much then.
Comm General Aves as soon as you have control. Use the lab comm system--the Empire's monitoring Republic frequencies.
I should return to my work for the councillor. It was a pleasure.
Calling as instructed, Deena. The Beharen Droid Factory is up and running.
Perfect. Your disaster relief droids should be ready. You can use the remotes to control them.
I'm impressed. It would have taken the workers weeks to reopen the factory.
When you have the Force, anything's possible.
I'm a Jedi Knight.
I could say the same about information.
A droid factory could be a real asset to the Republic.
We should use it.
I've already notified CorSec about reclaiming the area. Any more droids will go straight into battle.
Special ops is all about long odds and fast action.
I'm trained for this.
The Republic might have a chance at freeing Corellia after all.
Beautiful women are a nice motivator.
[Flirt] With your help.
Let's hope the Empire has some in their lab.
You gave the instructions. I just followed them.
We're a good team.
You'd be surprised how many men find that difficult.
With the factory working, do I have the droids I need?
Let's stay focused.
That was not fun.
Getting the factory going was easy. Surviving the Empire's lab will be the hard part.
[This comm station cannot be accessed at this time.]
